name: Airsonic
short_description: Self-hosted music streaming server with web interface and mobile apps.
description: Self-hosted music streaming server with web interface and mobile apps. Airsonic is a self-hosted application focused on media, music, audio, gaming. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Airsonic on your home server to self-hosted music streaming server with web interface and mobile apps without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Airsonic to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
